page.title: 16EVENTS
page.content: Knighton has four main yearly events. {Fair Day}is on May 19th.,each year. People come in from oulying areas to enjoy all the fun of the fair.This Fair Day was decreed by a charter. {Knighton Carnival and Show}takes place on the last Saturday in August each year.It takes place on Bryn y Castell. There is a procession of floats at midday and a torchlight procession in the evening.The attractions of the carnival are the dog show,exhibition of traction engines,horticultural show,art,craft and photographic competitions and sports and cycle racing. {Knighton Eisteddfod}used to take place on the first Saturday in July but this year it is taking place in September. Children and adults compete in singing,reciting,playing of instruments and creative arts.
